|brand = Check Point |model = L-61i |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 4BQ00CIPE1X10 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN7010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = v3 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = MMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GMDEA-4M IT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125 IT; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1322; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6350R; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.07;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.20;;
|exp_if_types = SFP, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Micro SD Card |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink, metal case, |addchip = Dual FET Bus Switch w/Level Shifting;TI;SN74CBTD3306;;3;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;2;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, Low Voltage Buffer/Line Driver;Fairchild;74LCX244;;2;,,, 802.3at PD w/ Synchronous Flyback Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4278;;1;,,, 100V, 60A N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semi;FDMS86101;;1;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Infineon;BSC034N06NS;;1;,,, 1A Power-Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2061;;2;,,, Serial I2C Real Time Clock;Renesas;IDT1339;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;Globaltech;GS1117A;;1;,,, 8K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C64D;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = HannStar |manuf_model = CIP1100 |manuf_rev = VER:E |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B015OKJ0LU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Check Point L-61i - Next Generation Security Appliance :CPAP-SG1200R-NGFW - 1200R Next Generation Firewall Security Appliance :CPAP-SG1200R-NGTP - 1200R Next Generation Threat Prevention Security Appliance
"CIP1100 VER:E", "4BQ00CIPE1X10" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN7010 MIPS64 v3 (@1.2GHz) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4GB MMC Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet, 2x Shared Gigabit/SFP ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel or 12-72V DC via 3
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/product-related/datasheets/ds-1200R-rugged-appliance.pdf Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Check Point L-61i Internal.jpeg|Internal View File:Check Point L-61i Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point L-61i Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
